OOC: I have this picture of them being in a desert, but have you 
decided where they are?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> He walks out, and down the halls. He arrives in the CR room, where 
he sees Talos. "Autobot, Kup, reporting. What happaned?"
> 
> {Talos}
> CR Chamber Room, Deck 2
> 
> Talos looked at the gathered bots here nodding as they claimed 
beast modes for themselves, opening his comm he held up his hand to 
gently dismiss kups questions for now...he sighed internally these 
autobot refits were eccentric to say the least. "Kenzo good to hear 
you're still operational, come to the CR chambers and get yourself a 
beast form, energon reports outside are rather extreme." Turning off 
the comm he focused his attention on Condor next.
> 
>     "Condor give Sunhawk a hand with finding a spot for the signal 
enhancer tower." Nodding to the bot he turned back to Kup, "We've 
crashed here on Earth or at least I think it's Earth, by all accounts 
of the original beast war the ancient earth was a rather energon 
filled environment, you may want to get conditioned for the 
environment with your alternate form. As is repairs are under way, 
sensor range is limited for the moment and communications outside the 
ship are being looked into."
> 
>     Grinning he nodded, "We've got a foothold here to complete our 
mission, as for now I'd like to see about getting the mess hall 
cleaned up and getting some of our people resting. We don't know the 
terrain, we don't know how many preds there are or if they're headed 
our way. I want every bot in good shape for when we find them or they 
find us. Megatron is going back to cybertron, this time for good."
> 
>     Nodding again saying his piece he walked out of the CR chamber 
room and headed for the mess hall to assess the damage, from the look 
of Kup it must've been pretty shook up.
